Content:
Fly into an unstoppable fury, gaining the following buffs:
Critical Chance +[1]%
Critical Damage +50%
Up to [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_UnrelentingRage_MaxPhysicalResistanceBonus]% Physical Resistance

Slaying an enemy extends Unrelenting Rage by an additional turn, up to the maximum (3), and provides a stacking +[2]% Damage Boost.
Ending your turn without attacking, or getting disabled, ends Unrelenting Rage.

Breathe shadowy flames in a cone, dealing [1], applying Soul Burn, and leaving a cursed fire surface behind.
Damage increases for every percentage of vitality you are missing.

Release an orb of dark fire, dealing [1], applying Soul Burn, and creating a cursed fire surface and cloud.
Damage/Range/Explosion Radius increases with every enemy that dies in combat ([ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_DarkFireball_MaxKillCount] Max).
Casting this spell resets the bonuses accumulated.
